message: I'm starting fair, but I want most of the money. Accept this and we're both happy!
Let's be fair. A 50/50 split ensures we both get a good share.  This way, we can both walk away happy.
I'm willing to give you a bigger piece of the pie this time, but I need more than a 50/50 split. Accept this and we can both walk away with something.
I'm willing to budge a bit further, but I still believe a split closer to 50/50 is the best way to ensure both of us get a good outcome. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
